hints.content:
Let's look at each number one at a time.  

 Hundreds | Tens | Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-: |:-:
$\purpleD8$ | $\blueE5$ | $\maroonD2$

$\begin{align}
\purpleD8\text{ hundreds} &=\purpleD{800}\\\\
\blueE5\text{ tens} &=\blueE{50}\\\\
\maroonD2\text{ ones} &=\maroonD2
\end{align}$

$852=\purpleD{800}+\blueE{50}+\maroonD2$

Hundreds | Tens | Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-: |:-:
$\purpleD8$ | $\blueE2$ | $\maroonD5$

$\begin{align}
\purpleD8\text{ hundreds} &=\purpleD{800}\\\\
\blueE2\text{ tens} &=\blueE{20}\\\\
\maroonD5\text{ ones} &=\maroonD5
\end{align}$

$825=\purpleD{800}+\blueE{20}+\maroonD5$

Here is the completed table:

Number | Expanded form
:-: | :-: | -
$852$ | $800+50+2$
$850$ | $800+ 50$
$825$ | $800+20+5$

question.content:
**Match each number to its expanded form.**
